column6: Not only have the X-Men escaped from the Age of X, but so have the most dangerous monsters from Legion's psyche! Desperate to find them, Legion and a team of X-Men leave the safety of Utopia, but it won't be long before they are in over their heads.
column8: | writer:Mike Carey | editor:Daniel Ketchum | penciller:Steve Kurth | penciller (cover):Mico Suayan
